metadata.title: CVE-2018-11563 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 6.0.x through6.0.7. A carefully constructed email could be used to inject and executearbitrary stylesheet or JavaScript code in a logged in customer's browserin the context of the OTRS customer panel application.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
